recipe_name: Griddled steak and sweet potato salad with kale and orange and chilli dressing
author: Alex Mackay
method: For the salad, heat a griddle pan until hot. Rub the steak with olive oil and season with salt and freshly ground black pepper. Cook on the griddle for 4-5 minutes on each side, or until cooked to your liking. Leave to rest. For the dressing, place all the dressing ingredients into a bowl, season with salt and freshly ground black pepper and mix well. To serve, place the kale onto a serving plate and top with the steak. Place the sweet potato and orange slices around the plate and drizzle over the dressing.
ingredients: 200g/7oz rump steak, trimmed,  1 tbsp olive oil,  salt and freshly ground black pepper ,  3 kale leaves, blanched, drained and finely chopped,  ½ sweet potato, peeled and sliced into 1cm/½in rounds, blanched and drained,  1 orange, peeled and sliced,  1 tbsp olive oil,  2 tsp clear honey,  1 orange, zest and juice,  1 chilli, finely chopped,  small handful fresh parsley, chopped,  salt and freshly ground black pepper
